description:
Now that Perl 6 is available in a usable form, over the past twelve months Damian has revisited some of his favourite Perl 5 modules and reimplemented them in “native” Perl 6.

In this talk he will walk through the changes needed to port three of those modules, a journey that gives a surprisingly thorough overview of how the two languages differ, as well as insights into the relative strengths of each.
title: (Re)Developing in Perl 6
